title: email address
extract: Update your email address. Log in to twitter.com and go to your Account settings page. Type your email address into the Email field. Note: An email address can only be associated with one Twitter account at a time. Click the Save changes button at the bottom of the page.
extract_html: Update your email address. Log in to twitter.com and go to your Account settings page. Type your email address into the Email field. Note: An email address can only be associated with one Twitter account at a time. Click the Save changes button at the bottom of the page.
